author: hikariws
content: It also seems that Polygon plans to have MATIC blockchain as a mainchain on their network, then add rollups over it. It looks more like marketing, to claim they're gonna support any kind of tech that arises. But maybe they claim to be a sidechain because they support EVM and to call attention from services that are struggling on ETH and don't wanna port to other technology, but in fact they are developing a separated network as Binance is.

author: mrfwashere
content: that is just a centralized bridge though isnt it? so would be the same as any other evm clone chain

author: hikariws
content: yes

content: so i would argue they are all considered sidechains, or none are
